00011     XsecBiasingOperatorMessenger::XsecBiasingOperatorMessenger(XsecBiasingOperator* oprt) :
00012         operator_(oprt) {
00013     
00014         biasingDir_ = new G4UIdirectory{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/"};
00015 
00016         biasAllCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithoutParameter{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/bias_all", this};
00017         biasAllCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00018                                         G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00019         biasAllCmd_->SetGuidance("Bias all particles of the given type."); 
00020 
00021         biasIncidentCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithoutParameter{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/bias_incident", this};
00022         biasIncidentCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00023                                         G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00024         biasIncidentCmd_->SetGuidance("Bias only the incident particle."); 
00025 
00026         particleTypeCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/particle", this};
00027         particleTypeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00028                                              G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00029         particleTypeCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the particle type to bias."); 
00030 
00031         processCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/process", this};
00032         processCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00033                                         G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00034         processCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the process to bias."); 
00035         
00036         thresholdCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/threshold", this};
00037         thresholdCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,
00038                                           G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00039         thresholdCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the minimum energy required to bias a particle."); 
00040         
00041         xsecTransCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString{"/ldmx/biasing/xsec/factor", this};
00042         xsecTransCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_PreInit,  
00043                                           G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00044         xsecTransCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the factor by which the xsec will increase."); 
00045     }

00047     XsecBiasingOperatorMessenger::~XsecBiasingOperatorMessenger() {
00048         delete biasingDir_;
00049         delete biasAllCmd_;
00050         delete biasIncidentCmd_;  
00051         delete particleTypeCmd_;
00052         delete processCmd_;
00053         delete thresholdCmd_;
00054         delete xsecTransCmd_;
00055     }
00056 
00057     void XsecBiasingOperatorMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand* command, G4String newValue) {
00058         
00059         if (command == biasAllCmd_) { 
00060             operator_->biasAll(); 
00061         } else if (command == biasIncidentCmd_) { 
00062             operator_->biasIncident(); 
00063         } else if (command == particleTypeCmd_)  {
00064             operator_->setParticleType(newValue); 
00065         } else if (command == processCmd_) {
00066             operator_->setProcess(newValue); 
00067         } else if (command == thresholdCmd_) { 
00068             operator_->setThreshold(G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValue)); 
00069         } else if (command == xsecTransCmd_) { 
00070             operator_->setXsecFactor(G4UIcommand::ConvertToDouble(newValue));
00071         }
00072     }
00073 }
